definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Phocidae, family within Carnivora including seal

sentences.english: While we have been at sea, Jeanie has been working on a seal skin.
sentences.chinese: 在我们喝茶的时候，珍妮正在加工一张海豹皮。

sentences.english: A seal body fat is one of the natural enemies of the penguins.
sentences.chinese: 体态肥硕得海豹是企鹅的天敌之一。

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹岛附近海域，大白鲨常会从水中冲出猎杀海狗。

sentences.english: They prey mainly on sea lions, seals, and small toothed whales
sentences.chinese: 它们以海狮，海豹，小型齿鲸为食。

sentences.english: But there are tens of thousands other baby seals who are not as lucky as Shammy.
sentences.chinese: 而十多万只幼年海豹却不曾如此幸运。

sentences.english: The anchor point did not itself provide the shark with the best chance of intercepting a seal.
sentences.chinese: 定位点本身并不能提供给鲨鱼截杀海豹的最好机会。

sentences.english: It is the primary "heavy" gun carried by SEALs on patrol.
sentences.chinese: 它是海豹突击队在巡逻时主要使用的重型武器。

sentences.english: Such as seals, penguins, polar bear and it's narwhal's home.
sentences.chinese: 比如海豹，企鹅，北极熊，那里还是独角鲸的故乡。

sentences.english: He misses. The seal dives into his ice hole and is gone.
sentences.chinese: 汤米开枪了，但是没有击中，海豹潜入冰洞中消失了。

sentences.english: Polar bears hunt ringed seals, which live under the Arctic ice.
sentences.chinese: 北极熊猎食住在北极冰层下的环斑海豹。

sentences.english: Hawaiian monk seal on the beach in Kauai.
sentences.chinese: 一只僧海豹躺在夏威夷，考艾岛的沙滩上。

sentences.english: It's in the summer months that you'll find Baikal's most famous residents - the Baikal seals.
sentences.chinese: 贝加尔湖数量最多的居民就是贝加尔海豹。

sentences.english: Up on a little island there was a haul-out point for seals.
sentences.chinese: 这里的一座小岛上，有一处海豹栖息地。

sentences.english: Eskimos use seal to make tough threads.
sentences.chinese: 爱斯基摩人用海豹皮做坚韧的线。

sentences.english: Seals' copter shot down by Taliban rocket.
sentences.chinese: 美国海豹直升机被塔利班击落。

sentences.english: Swift and stealthy, adult leopard seals tend to be solitary creatures.
sentences.chinese: 成年海豹是独居动物，行动敏捷且神秘。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
